name: Un Mañana
description: "Un Mañana" is the 15th and last studio album recorded by argentinian musician Luis Alberto Spinetta, released in 2008. When asked about what the cover was (because he drew the little dude) he replied: "It's just a guy troubled by circumstances. He's climbing up, just in case" I've always felt like that little guy, and this is just a tribute. Gracias Flaco, sos eterno. Artwork by @luqispataro. 2008x2008, 15 editions.
